CHAT.comment: Chi seems embarrassed to read in front of people , and is somewhat reluctant to do the task. Mot encourages Chi throughout the activity. Most of Chi's dialogue is reading the book and the letter out loud. Chi requests a lot of help from Mot.

u.a: do not know who she is addressing or even if it is her for sure
reading the title of the book
MOT is offering to get Chi a bandaid because she is bleeding . Chi is making sounds of pain
<$=1> Mot is yelling from other room
MOT instructing Chi to put her hand out as Mot puts a bandaid on
Chi asks if the wound is still going to bleed
aft Chi writes dear Eric Carle
Chi's pencil just squeaked across the paper
walks across room and looks in bag for another pencil
aft sounds of pencil on paper
Chi tapping pencil impatiently on table
aft Chi writes and turns pages
trying the eraser on the letter
probably fiddling with the tape recorder
aft Chi probably begins to sign her name
softly on last three words of utterance
